name: Food
description: Food is essential for your population's survival.

name: Materials
description: Materials are used to build structures and craft items.

name: Luxuries
description: Luxuries increase your population's happiness and well-being.

name: Science
description: Science is used to research new technologies and improve your civilization.

name: Population
description: Population represents the number of people in your civilization. It is crucial for workforce and growth, but can cause issues if it exceeds your capacity.
